T02TD3006E:62b-0: @62b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3006E:63a-1: gnod pa sna tshogs rengs par byed do //
T02TD3006E:63a-2: lus kyi gnod pa'i nus pa dang bral bar 'dod na /
T02TD3006E:63a-3: sarba ku lam aa brta ya h'um h'um zhes 'bum phrag dgu bzlas nas ce spyang gi khrag la bsngags nas gtor nam mo'i gdon rnams rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD3006E:63a-4: sarba aa tsa le h'um h'um zhes 'bum phrag bdun bzlas nas zangs phye la brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags la gtor na gcan gzan khro bo rnams rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD3006E:63a-5: sarba n'a sha ya phu: h'um h'um zhes 'bum phrag lnga bzlas nas gla rtsi la brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags nas gtor na sbrul rengs par nges so //
T02TD3006E:63a-6: sarba dusht'am badzra aa ka jva la ya h'um h'um zhes bsnyen pa 'bum phrag dgu bzlas nas sa dang chul sogs pa la brgyad rtsa brgyad bsngags nas gtor na 'byung po'i gdon rnams rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD3006E:63a-7: sarba ma h'a mi ni du ru du ru h'um h'um zhes 'bum phrag dgu bzlas nas yungs kar dang yungs nag la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags nas gtor na gdon thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD3006E:63a-8: sarba aa mu ka m'a ra ya h'um h'um phat ces 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas nas rkun ma'i rjes sa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags nas gtor na rkun ma rnams rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD3006E:63a-9: bsgrub bya rengs pa'i las sna tshogs pa bstan pa rlung gi zhags pa zhes bya ba slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
